attackTemplate: ATTACKER targets TARGET wit' a distance o' RANGE
discordInviteTitle: Any ideas? Feedback? Wants t' help translate the website t' ye language? Join our discord!
partyHint: Skewer on the tiles t' add/move heroes. Skewer on the party list t' add/change heroes!
dialogHint: Ye can also press enter t' select first hero in the list
shareDialogInfo: Copy this link t' share yer layout!
helpDialogCharAiTypesDesc: Heroes 'ave a couple different AI presets, that matter durin' the target selection.
helpDialogMeleeAiInfoDesc: Heroes wit' Melee AI, target the nearest untargeted hero. If none are available, they target the nearest hero instead.
helpDialogRangedAiInfoDesc: Heroes wit' Ranged AI target the nearest hero.
helpDialogAllyAiInfoDesc: Heroes wit' Buffer AI, try t' buff thar hearties; they target the furthest allied hero.
helpDialogAssassinAiInfoDesc: Heroes wit' Assassin AI target heroes o' the ranged crew. If thar are multiple ranged crew enemy heroes, they try t' target the closest untargeted ranged crew hero. If thar be a single ranged crew hero in the enemy crew, they target it, regardless if it's targeted or nah. If the enemy crew has no ranged crew heroes, Assassin AI heroes use Melee targetin' instead.
helpDialogOrderMattersDesc: When plannin', don't forget t' make sure, that yer heroes are in the correct order! Targetin' goes from party leader t' the last character in yer crew, so the order matters a lot. The same goes fer the enemy crew.
helpDialogThingsToConsiderDesc: Thar are more things t' Colosseum, than initial targetin'. Advanced Colosseum players shall also consider taunts 'n target reset! Fer target reset info, consider watchin' this video
creditsDialogInfoDesc: This web app was created thanks t' continuous support o' many scallywags. 'tis list o' these great scallywags!
creditsDialogRestThanksDesc: Thanks t' Kong studios 'n Kakaogames fer makin' this awesome game, 1D-Gamer fer lots o' information about Colosseum inner workings 'n another big thanks t' ye, the user!
creditsDialogDevelopThanksDescWorm: TheWorm - Idea, Programmin', Design, Russian translation
creditsDialogDevelopThanksDescPoteto: Poteto aka Oukaya aka FleurDeLis - I ahve t' thank the owner o' all those names fer Design 'n German translation('n fer puttin' hats on cats)
